title: Aleene's 15592 FLEXABLE Stretchable Glue 4OZ. 36.CS, Multicolor, 4 Fl Oz
description: Aleene's flexible stretchable glue. 4 ounces. Perfect for use on t-shirts and other stretchy fabrics to glue sequins, glitter, beads and more! permanent glue that dries clear. Make your creative ideas stick with this specialized glue!.
